content.rendered:
I accompanied the fabulous 40s-themed Marjorie Belles to their Hednas vintage nightclub gig at The Stables the other weekend. It was absolutely brilliant, and afterwards I had a bit of fun putting together this audio slideshow of the night.

Marjorie Belles – In The Mood from Emma Marshall on Vimeo.
